channel.title: How to get a free gameboy on your computer with all games called visual boy
channel.description:
Ok, I had this for a year and now i think everyone should know :P.
Purpose:A free gameboy and free games (games are seperate dls) NO virus scan yourself!
Ok first go to www.romsparagba.org
First change the language to english because it's all in brazilian, to do that when you get on the website on the right hand side there should be a brazilian flag and a amercian flag.(where it says idioma) ok once you have changed it to english Read all the steps and you should have a free gba!!!!!
Step 1: get the gba.
go to the home page or just type the site again. Then scroll down a BIT! and you should see gameboy advance on the right hand side . (first you will see lastest roms then gameboy advance after that. ok now click emulator!!!! then it will say if you want to open or save file .save it to your desktop or anywhere you want it! k now you havee the gba.
step 2: get games!
go to the homepage again and on the right hand side it will say lastest roms above gameboy advance. then click gba.you will see a list of the lastest games (there only the lastest but there r WAY more!!)ok go to gameboy advance on the right hand side. then click top 100. ok now you will see a bunch of games. pick the game you want (name of game on top of all the details)then go to make download it will show things like megupload rapid share etc.!k save the game where ur gba is. now u run the games!!!! open your gba and make the screen bigger. now click file on the top and then click open find the game wherever you saved it and there you go !!! post errors i can fix (or i will try)
End of my short but good tut. (posted here because we have to dl stuff)
Next tut comin out of how to get free nintendo ds!!!!
[code]CONTROLS for THIS:
GBA | VBA
A Z B X START ENTER SELECT BACKSPACE[/code]

item.title: How to get a free gameboy on your computer with all games called visual boy
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“bowserjr2, post:9, topic:126795”]Yes that I know but you have NOT allowed to download the movie/cd self if you own it, but you can copy it self and use it.

And of course the is different to what country you live.[/quote]

You can do whatever you like to the movie/cd/rom, including download, as you own limited copyrights to it.

Read full topic

item.title: How to get a free gameboy on your computer with all games called visual boy
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

xxlegitxx:

Bowserjr2… don’t act like a dumbass. You can play roms on an emulator if you have the game just like you can rip and copy dvd’s if you own an original copy.

Yes that I know but you have NOT allowed to download the movie/cd self if you own it, but you can copy it self and use it.

And of course the is different to what country you live.

item.title: How to get a free gameboy on your computer with all games called visual boy
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“bowserjr2, post:5, topic:126795”][quote author=I Am Olan14 link=topic=177401.msg1626539#msg1626539 date=1185338102]

The are not allowed to Download the roms if you want to follow the law.

and who does?
srsly.
And moparsc4p3, this is utterly sad.
All you’re doing is downloading an emulator and some ROMs.
Not “a free gameboy on your coputer with games called visualboy”.
Go die pls.

[/quote]
That your doing is download piratecopied games and a emulator.

That is the same so you download movies and music or other pirate things.

  1. Old news

  2. You can get games for all systems, I’m not sure about the PS3, Wii, or XBOX 360.

  3. It’s legal if you have the ROM irl, or have had it before and hadn’t sold it.

Can you give a source to this rule (A real source and not from a download site.)[/quote]Source to that rule? I know for a fact it is -.-

Read full topic

item.title: How to get a free gameboy on your computer with all games called visual boy
item.dc:creator: @moparsc4p3 moparsc4p3
item.description:
@moparsc4p3 wrote:

Ok, I had this for a year and now i think everyone should know :P.

Purpose:A free gameboy and free games (games are seperate dls)
NO virus scan yourself!

Ok first go to www.romsparagba.org

First change the language to english because it’s all in brazilian, to do that when you get on the website on the right hand side there should be a brazilian flag and a amercian flag.(where it says idioma) ok once you have changed it to english Read all the steps and you should have a free gba!!!

Step 1: get the gba.

go to the home page or just type the site again. Then scroll down a BIT! and you should see gameboy advance on the right hand side . (first you will see lastest roms then gameboy advance after that. ok now click emulator!!! then it will say if you want to open or save file .save it to your desktop or anywhere you want it! k now you havee the gba.

step 2: get games!

go to the homepage again and on the right hand side it will say lastest roms above gameboy advance. then click gba.you will see a list of the lastest games (there only the lastest but there r WAY more!!)ok go to gameboy advance on the right hand side. then click top 100. ok now you will see a bunch of games. pick the game you want (name of game on top of all the details)then go to make download it will show things like megupload rapid share etc.!k save the game where ur gba is. now u run the games!!! open your gba and make the screen bigger. now click file on the top and then click open find the game wherever you saved it and there you go !!! post errors i can fix (or i will try)

End of my short but good tut. (posted here because we have to dl stuff)

Next tut comin out of how to get free nintendo ds!!!

[code]CONTROLS for THIS:

GBA | VBA

A Z
B X
START ENTER
SELECT BACKSPACE[/code]
